results.name: Positions of permutations of A060117 in reversed colexicographic ordering A055089.
comment: Together with the inverse A060126 this can be used to conjugate between "multiplication tables" of A261096 & A261216 (and for example, their main diagonals A261099 & A261219, or between involutions A056019 & A060125, see the Formula section) that have been computed for these two common alternative orderings of permutations. - _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 28 2016
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5040
